setCompassConfiguration

boolean setCompassConfiguration(org.compass.core.config.CompassConfiguration conf)
Set the compass configuration from user custom. After the setting, EntityControllerFullTextSearch engine will abandon the old instance and rebuild a new one.

Parameters:
conf - the new CompassConfiguration instance
Returns:
true if the rebuild is successful; otherwise, return false;

setCompassConfiguration

boolean setCompassConfiguration(java.lang.String compassName)
Read the compass configuration from database and rebuild the EntityControllerFullTextSearch engine with the new setting.

Parameters:
compassName - the name of compass instance.
Returns:
true if the rebuild is successful; otherwise, return false;

Returns:

readEntitiesWithIndexUsingLuceneQueryParserSyntax

java.util.List<coredb.unit.EntityInstance> readEntitiesWithIndexUsingLuceneQueryParserSyntax(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                                                             java.lang.String queryTerm,
                                                                                             int pageIndex,
                                                                                             int pageSize,
                                                                                             coredb.sql.SQLStatement sql)
Search using pure Lucene syntax with paging and sql conditions

Parameters:
tableName - table which will be query in the current search
queryTerm - the query term of Lucene
pageIndex - the current page index
pageSize - the number of records will be displayed after the page index;
sql - the sql statement
Returns:
a list of entity instances.

readEntitiesWithIndexUsingLuceneQueryParserSyntax

pageSize - the number of records will be displayed after the page index;

readEntitiesWithIndexFuzzyQuery

java.util.List<coredb.unit.EntityInstance> readEntitiesWithIndexFuzzyQuery(java.util.List<java.lang.String> tableNames,
                                                                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> keywords,
                                                                           float minmiumSmilarity)
Search the entity instances matched with a list of keywords and read the fuzzy result back from a list of tables. The fuzzy level can be balanced by the parameter minmiumSmilarity

Parameters:
tableNames - the list of tables which query apply on, set as null if you do not want to specify query table
keywords - the list of search conditions
minmiumSmilarity -
Returns:
a list of entity instances

saveCurrentIndexDataToOtherIndexStorage

boolean saveCurrentIndexDataToOtherIndexStorage(org.compass.core.config.CompassConfiguration configuration,
                                                boolean isCleanOld,
                                                boolean isRebuild)
This function save current index data to another index storage (eg: from JDBC to File)

Parameters:
configuration - the compass configuration of the destination index storage
isCleanOld - indicates whether clean all index data store in current index storage
isRebuild - indicates whether rebuild compass using the new storage
Returns:
returns true if action is successful, otherwise returns false
